products.title: Silver Birch Shadow Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Silver birch shadow roman blind in grey/yellow/multicoloured. Made to measure from 16.80 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Silver birch, a beautiful floral pattern available in 3 varieties of natural colours. 
 
This floral roman blind is made up of grey and yellow tones that combine to make a truly beautiful finishperfect for any room.
 
 Product id: db-rom0852 fabric colour: shadow material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Silver Birch, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Silver birch, shadow - roman blind with a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across th
products.productdescription: With a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across the fabric reminds the eye of the free-flowing beauty of watercolour masterpieces. When you want to work shadow into your dcor it pays to keep things simple. Find a matching scatter cushion cover or throw for the end of the bed and keep the rest of your dcor neutral. That way you'll be able to let the art really come to the fore. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
